Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Team
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, java.io.Serializable
    Contains a list of Hero objects and has a name.
    Author:
    jesse
